jcr:content.jcr:description: Check out the Torin Family from Altra Running. The Torin 5 is everything you love about the Torin 4.5 Plush, with an even more luxurious, locked-in feel.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Torin 5 Family

video.description: Video of people running in the new Torin 5
video.name: Altra Running Torin 5

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML:
THE ALL-NEW TORIN 5:
THE TORIN 4.5 PLUSH
REIMAGINED

customhtml2.customHTML: The Torin 5 is everything you love about the Torin 4.5 Plush, with an even more luxurious, locked-in feel.

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
FOCUSED FIT AND FEEL

The mesh upper is lightweight and breathable while the increased heel collar padding provides a more secure fit.

image.alt: Detail shots of the rose pink Altra Torin 5

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
PERFORMANCE TO THE MAX

The Torin 5 features our new Altra EGO MAX midsole for our most plush and bouncy ride, with added durability.

image.alt: Close-up shot of the Altra EGO MAX midsole on the Torin 5
Lower body shot of a woman running in black tights and the coral pink Altra Torin 5

customhtml2.customHTML:
ALTRA FOOTSHAPE COMFORT

Our signature FootShape comfort gives your feet more space to sit naturally and is designed to address biological differences in men's and women's feet.

image.alt: Top of shoe shot of the Women's Altra Torin 5 in gray/lime
